forced.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a forced smile, laugh etc is not natural or sincere
forced.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: ‘Oh, hello, ’ said Eileen, with forced brightness.
forced.translation[0].definitions[1].def: done suddenly and quickly because the situation makes it necessary, not because it was planned or wanted
forced.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The plane had to make a forced landing in a field.
the forced repatriation of thousands of refugees
